oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A rearrangeable nonblocking multi-log2N multicast switching network
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ZHENG, SQ
GUMASTE, ASHWIN
SHEN, HONG
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: multicast communication
switching networks
telecommunication network routing
blocking probability
multicasting
network routing
parallel processing system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new rearrangeable nonblocking photonic multi- log2N network DM(N) is introduced. It is shown that DM(N) network simultaneously possesses many good properties, including those of existing rearrangeable nonblocking multi-log2 N networks and new ones such as O(logN)-time fast parallel self-routing and nonblocking multiple-multicast.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the IEEE Global Telecommunications Conference, San Francisco, California, USA, 27 November-1 December 2006, 1-6
